task_description: Facing the building to your North-West (approx. 297°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: To estimate the height of the building, I need to look up to see the top of the structure, as my current pitch is level with the horizon.
I am currently looking upwards but need to adjust my heading to align with the building's direction at 297° to view its full height.
I need to look up again to see the top of the building while maintaining my current heading towards the building.
I need to adjust my heading to 297° while looking up to properly view the building's height.
I am now correctly oriented towards the building and looking up, allowing me to estimate its height from the ground to the roof.
